```{r}
mc_salamanders <- mack_verts
```

```{r}
plot_salamander <- ggplot(data = mc_salamanders,
                          aes(x = length1, y = weight)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, color = "orange") +
  theme_minimal()

plot_salamander
 

```
```{r}
ggsave(plot = plot_salamander, here::here("figs", "salamander_size.png"))
```
